an4.134:4.1: “These four people are found in the world.
an4.134:4.3: ~One who lives off the fruit of initiative, but not deeds; ~one who lives off the fruit of deeds, but not initiative; ~one who lives off the fruit of both initiative and deeds; and ~one who lives off the fruit of neither initiative nor deeds.
an4.134:4.4: These are the four people found in the world.”
